actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to make it unlawful to offer for sale or distribute certain pyrotechnic devices to individuals under the age of 16 or to any other person without a required warning label.

summary.text: Signal Flare Safety Act - Considers a pyrotechnic signal device, as defined in specified Federal regulations, to be a banned hazardous product under certain provisions of the Consumer Product Safety Act if it: (1) is offered for sale or distributed in commerce to an individual under 16 years old; or (2) does not bear specified warning labels.

titles.title: A bill to make it unlawful to offer for sale or distribute certain pyrotechnic devices to individuals under the age of 16 or to any other person without a required warning label.
